title: Should KUMA migrate to v2?
body:
Summary:
As the engaging purpose, we sent 50% of KUMA to Vitalik when we started the project. 
It's too risky to grow Kuma community as people are still worrying about VB's rug.

Migration process:
- Launching v2 token.
- Liquidity removal from the current Uniswap KUMA/ETH pair.
- Liquidity Add for the new v2 token. (100% of the removed liquidity will be re-added)
- Kuma holders deposit old KUMA tokens to the Migration contract and claim v2 tokens. (There will be bonus tokens which are coming from Unstaking fee of Kuma Breeder.)

We will keep the same tokenomics as before.
50% of total supply which has been kept by VB's wallet will be burnt.
Additional 10% which was allocated for Co-founders will be also burnt.
author: 0x209253398FDa21a60dd5105e103Cb6e6eDCF4326
